body.description: Gold Bond Men's Essentials Everyday Moisture Lotion for body and hands is formulated specifically for men with dry skin. It's made with seven moisturizers three vitamins to replenish, hydrate and soften men's skin. This daily moisturizing formula for men also contains vitamin C, an antioxidant that helps protect skin against environmental stressors. What's more, Gold Bond Everyday Moisture Lotion for men is hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested, fast-absorbing and nongreasy. Stock up on 14.5-ounce bottles of Gold Bond Men's Essentials Everyday Moisture so you always have nourishing hydration on hand when you need it most.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your Triple Threat for Great-Feeling, Good-Looking, Irresistible-Smelling Skin Body Lotion Behold, moisturizers that are specially formulated for men’s tough, dry skin. Both Gold Bond Men’s Essentials Everyday Moisture and Gold Bond Men’s Essentials Intensive Therapy are made with 7 moisturizers and 3vitamins, plus skin-strengthening proteins to restore smoother, softer skin. Powder Feel like a million bucks. Smell like even more with Gold Bond Body Powder for Men. This body powder features a unique triple-action formula that absorbs moisture, cools skin, and controls odor*. Best of all, the formula is talc-free. Spray Gold Bond Body Powder Spray for Men comes in a convenient spray bottle for easy, no-mess application. This men’s body powder spray absorbs moisture and comes in Nightfall and Recharge scents to keep you feeling and smelling fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious lotion that lasts a long time
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is great for my dry hands. It lasts a long time; you don't have to keep putting it on every half hour. I really like the scent, which is like a men's shampoo or fragrance - not too strong, but nice aroma. The lotion feels very luxurious and expensive, and it is kind of on the upper end of what I would normally spend for hand lotion, but it really works, and I don't have to use it nearly as often as I would have to use a cheaper lotion.I had a hard time opening the top the when I first received the bottle, and thought it was broken. It kind of was, but I was able to put it back together. I would have returned it otherwise, although the logistics of returning an open, broken bottle of lotion would have been tricky. Fortunately it worked out and I'm happy with my purchase. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells Amazing and Keeps My Hands alive
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is really really nice, smells premium and feels nice on the skin after a few minutes, literally cologne in the form of lotion, plus you end up baby smooth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A light, clean, masculine scent, (not citrus or fruity) that is practical for both men and women.
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I have found that this scent doesn't interfere with cologne or perfume smells. It is a clean scent-maybe with some musk, that I find calming at bedtime, on my hands and elbows. It is practical for both of us and we take it on trips in the squeeze tube size, so we can both use it. The lotion is thick and absorbs completely in a minute or less. I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nourish and Hydrate Your Skin with Gold Bond Men's Essentials Hydrating Lotion
reviews.reviewText: I recently added Gold Bond Men's Essentials Hydrating Lotion to my daily skincare routine, and it has become an essential part of my grooming regimen. This hydrating lotion offers a powerful blend of moisturizing ingredients that provide everyday relief for dry skin, leaving it refreshed and revitalized.Effective Moisturization (4/5):The standout feature of this hydrating lotion is its ability to provide effective moisturization for dry skin. It is specially formulated with a combination of hydrating ingredients that help combat the discomfort and tightness associated with dry skin. Whether you're dealing with dryness due to weather, frequent handwashing, or other factors, this lotion offers much-needed relief.Non-Greasy Formula (4/5):One of the significant advantages of this lotion is its non-greasy formula. It absorbs quickly into the skin without leaving a heavy or oily residue, allowing you to apply it and go about your day without feeling sticky or uncomfortable.Long-Lasting Hydration (4/5):The Gold Bond Men's Essentials Hydrating Lotion provides long-lasting hydration, so you don't have to constantly reapply throughout the day. It helps maintain your skin's moisture balance, keeping it smooth and comfortable.Everyday Use (4/5):This lotion is suitable for everyday use, making it a practical addition to your daily grooming routine. Whether you use it after showering, before bedtime, or whenever your skin feels dry, it delivers the moisture your skin craves.Refreshing Scent (4/5):The lotion features a refreshing and subtle scent that leaves you feeling invigorated without being overpowering. It adds a touch of freshness to your grooming routine.Large Bottle Size (4/5):The 14.5-ounce bottle size provides ample product, ensuring you have enough lotion to keep your skin moisturized for an extended period. It offers excellent value for its size.Overall Impression:In conclusion, Gold Bond Men's Essentials Hydrating Lotion is a reliable and effective solution for combatting dry skin. Its ability to provide effective moisturization, non-greasy formula, and long-lasting hydration make it an excellent choice for individuals seeking relief from dryness and discomfort. Whether you have a specific concern or simply want to maintain smooth and comfortable skin, this lotion offers the moisture your skin needs without any unwanted residue. While it may not have some of the specialized features of premium skincare products, it excels in its ability to deliver everyday moisture for dry skin. If you're looking for a dependable and affordable hydrating lotion that keeps your skin refreshed and revitalized, Gold Bond Men's Essentials Hydrating Lotion is a smart investment that ensures your skin stays nourished and healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well. Amazon good value.
reviews.reviewText: Some samples were sent to me and I decided to try them. I have edema in my lower legs, some due to age, and on one leg worse due to past injuries. I wear high boot socks, compression support and usually mid boots or hikers. My legs were drying out and the skin was flaking, severely on my injured leg.Within two days my skin was vastly improved and by day four all dryness and flaking was gone. Color improved too. Skin feels soft and normal. I use this everyday now.My better half, who is sensitive to this sort of thing, says that the scent is pleasant and that she likes it. The scent is not strong or overwhelming.It doesn't require much to get coverage, just quarter sized dabs for each lower leg. It does need to be rubbed in, both to be absorbed and to provide coverage. I have settled on the method of using smaller dabs and covering "zones". It sinks in or is absorbed fairly quickly, you want to spread it around right away. It is absorbed completely, it doesn't make a mess or stain your clothes. My boot socks show no traces and it washes off my hands completely with water.I have no reservations recommending people try it.I shopped around, no one beat Amazon's Add-in price with Prime delivery to the door. Thank you again Amazon and Prime.I have no relationship with Gold Bond or Amazon. Just appreciate good products and service.
